mapper.sql: id, role_id, action_id, action_code, check_level, check_money, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted
mapper.select:
SELECT s.id, s.role_id roleId, s.action_id actionId, s.action_code actionCode, s.check_level checkLevel, s.check_money checkMoney, s.remark, s.create_by createBy, s.create_time createTime, s.update_by updateBy, s.update_time updateTime, s.is_deleted isDeleted, sr.role_name roleName,sm.title actionName,s.tenant_code tenantCode FROM sys_role_action_check s left join sys_menu sm on s.action_id = sm.id and sm.is_deleted = 0 left join sys_role sr on s.role_id = sr.id and sr.is_deleted = 0
s.is_deleted = 0
and
s.action_code like concat('%',#{form.condition},'%')
sr.role_name like concat('%',#{form.condition},'%')
AND s.tenant_code = #{form.tenantCode}
select * from sys_role_action_check srac where srac.is_deleted = 0 and srac.action_code = #{menuCode} GROUP BY check_level

select srac.*,sr.role_name roleName from sys_role_action_check srac left join sys_role sr on srac.role_id = sr.id and sr.is_deleted = 0 where srac.is_deleted = 0 and srac.action_code = #{menuCode} and srac.check_level = #{checkLevel}
